column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Tam - Thanks for your great review! I'm very glad to know you are among the growing ranks of ramen fans here in Houston. Indeed
column2: we are proud to be a part of the ever-expanding culinary scene in Houston and we will continue to work hard to earn your business. And special thanks for understanding the extended wait times during weekend-dinner hours. We do our best to keep things moving without being pushy.
